xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: AdminPresentationSheet
xwikidoc.content: ### Administrate the presentation preferences globally and at space level. #if("$!editor"=="globaladmin") #set($legend = ["header", "footer", "skin"]) #else #set($legend = ["header", "skin"]) #end #set($params = $util.hashMap) #set($params.header = ["title", "meta"]) #if("$!editor"=="globaladmin") #set($params.footer = ["webcopyright", "version"]) #end #set($params.skin = ["skin", "stylesheet", "stylesheets"]) #includeForm("XWiki.AdminFieldsDisplaySheet")
